Class Map

public class Map extends Object
The game's Map who control the towns of the game

  • Method Details

    • setMapWithJSON

      public void setMapWithJSON(String filename) throws NoSuchTownException, FileNotFoundException
      Initialize the map's towns by adding all maps and their neighbors in the towns array
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to read
      Throws:
      NoSuchTownException - The exception if one of the is missing (if the JsonReader file has mistakes)
      FileNotFoundException - The exception if the specified file doesn't exist

    • setMap

      public void setMap(ArrayList<Town> towns)
      Initialize the map's towns by adding all maps and their neighbors in the towns array
      Parameters:
      towns - The arrayList of towns to set

    • getTowns

      public ArrayList<Town> getTowns()
      Give the towns of the game
      Returns:
      The list of towns in the game

    • getTown

      public Town getTown(int i)
      Get a town by it's index
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the town to get
      Returns:
      The town at the i index in the towns array

    • getTownByName

      public Town getTownByName(String name) throws NoSuchTownException
      Get a town by it's name in the towns list
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the town to get
      Returns:
      The town who has the string name has name in the towns list
      Throws:
      NoSuchTownException - The exception if there is no town with that name in the towns array

    • getTownNeighbors

      public ArrayList<Town> getTownNeighbors(Town town)
      Get the neighbors of the town passed in parameter
      Parameters:
      town - The town to search neighbors
      Returns:
      All the neighbors of the town passed in parameters

    • areNeighbors

      public boolean areNeighbors(Town town1, Town town2)
      Tell if two towns are neighbors or not
      Parameters:
      town1 - The first town
      town2 - The second town
      Returns:
      true if the two towns are neighbors, else false

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Give all towns information in a String
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      All the information in the towns list
